email.subject: Call for workshops and tutorials associated with JELIA 2025

conference.name: 19th edition of the European Conference on Logics in Artificial Intelligence

call_for_proposals.description: The organizers of the JELIA conference are now inviting proposals for affiliated workshops and tutorials. We welcome submissions on any topic related to Artificial Intelligence.

workshop_details.purpose: provide a forum for presenting ongoing research that is not yet ready for formal publication
workshop_details.tutorial_details: offer in-depth introductions to specific topics or extended demonstrations of software tools

focus_areas: intersection of statistical and symbolic AI
call_for_proposals.encouragement: proposals that aim to bridge communities and foster dialogue between researchers working in machine learning, knowledge representation, logic, and cognitive systems
call_for_proposals.mission: promote foundational and applied research in logical aspects of AI

contact_information.invitation: If you are considering organizing a workshop or tutorial, please feel free to reach out to me by email as soon as possible.

submission_guidelines.seworld_information: http://sigsoft.org/resources/seworld.html provides more information on SEWORLD as well as links to a complete archive of messages posted to the list.
